page.title: 03ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: The main nucleus for arts and craft and entertainment within the block is to be found within the city region though the mining village of Brandon does have a colliery band. {Museums}located in this survey block are the{Gulbenkian Museum} (specialising in Chinese pottery), the {Cathedral Museum and undercroft,}the{ {Castle Museum,}and{Fulling Mill}(local history). There are adult courses providing a range of artistic activities (eg:-{ {spinning, weaving, photography and {pottery}). These are located in several centres such as the{Castle {Chare Community Arts Centre}and the{ {Adult Education Centre. }
